title: Thu Sep 24 '15 Announcement from SAMIH: Spotlight on Anti-Muslim Internet Hate
content:
The SAMIH campaign received national TV coverage on SBS News on Tuesday night. The news story featured the campaign and interviews on the topic of online anti-Muslim hate. It also highlighted how this new campaign is being supported by crowdfunding.If you haven't seen it, watch it now at the link below. If you have, please share this message and ask others to chip in to support the campaign!
Watch it now: http://www.sbs.com.au/news/article/2015/09/24/charity-takes-aim-anti-muslim-sentiment-social-media
